Posts.Content: Was diagnosed 11 years ago with breast cancer and now it looks like I will be diagnosed again. Worried incase the scans show up anything
Posts.Title: 2nd time diagnosed

Posts.Content: Hi Carolyn Yeah I remember that feeling, the psychological aspect took longer than the physical part to heal.  I had Lumpectomy, chemo, radiotherapy and tamoxifen for 5 years last time. Got the same people and team with me at the moment. Had my ct scan today and got my bone scan tomorrow.  Feeling ok most of today as starting to get my head around it all but gutted its all happening again.  Hope you are ok X
Posts.Title: 2nd time diagnosed

Posts.Content: Thank you for your comment pepsicat. I hope you are as well as can be at the moment. Just feeling a little lost in this big cancer world at the moment  Xxx
Posts.Title: 2nd time diagnosed

Posts.Content: Hi Maggs  Thank you so much for getting in touch with myself. I have been struggling to find anyone in my situation so far.  I'm so happy things are going well for you at the moment.  I'll feel much better next week once my scans come back. Pretty sure it's breast cancer again which I have my head around now. I've just got my fingers crossed for my scans which I scaring me more than anything else.  You have given me a little bit of hope in my long week of worry  Thank you  Kayla xxx
Posts.Title: 2nd time diagnosed

Posts.Content: Hi Thanks for your reply. Yeah very different now since first diagnosis. Yeah I was getting checked every year. Last check was November but I found a lump on my good breast a couple of weeks ago and I have now had an ultrasound, mammogram and biopsy as of today. Got a ct scan tomorrow, bone scan on Friday and all my results next Wednesday. I do have people I can talk to. Just feels strange the second time around. Thanks for the hug. Hope you are well
Posts.Title: 2nd time diagnosed

Posts.Content: Thank you Lynn  Yeah been a rubbish couple of weeks but glad to be getting things sorted now. My hospital has been great.  Xxx
Posts.Title: 2nd time diagnosed
